scripts.watch-duomo: watch --interval 0.1 'sass --style=compressed --no-charset --no-source-map src/consumer.scss dist/development.css && yarn prettier -w dist/development.css' src
scripts.build-duomo-dev: sass --style=compressed --no-charset --no-source-map builds/development.scss dist/development.css && yarn prettier -w dist/development.css
scripts.build-duomo-dev-full: sass --style=compressed --no-charset --no-source-map builds/development-full.scss dist/development-full.css && yarn prettier -w dist/development-full.css
scripts.build-duomo-prod: sass --style=compressed --no-charset --no-source-map builds/production.scss dist/production.css && yarn cleancss --level 2 dist/production.css -o dist/production.css
scripts.build-duomo-prod-full: sass --style=compressed --no-charset --no-source-map builds/production-full.scss dist/production-full.css && yarn cleancss --level 2 dist/production-full.css -o dist/production-full.css
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && yarn tsc && yarn build-duomo-dev && yarn build-duomo-dev-full && yarn build-duomo-prod && yarn build-duomo-prod-full
